Description: Degree of adherence to principles of openness and traceability in AI applications.
Quantifiable reduction in biases related to socioeconomic, geographic, or demographic factors.
Measures targeting the inclusion of underrepresented groups and regional balance.
Metrics from surveys gauging trust in AI implementations across key sectors.
Percentage of national AI initiatives complying with international ethical standards.
Evaluation of mechanisms ensuring AI systems can be deactivated or controlled effectively.
